Winter's Call

MA Jotunheim,  LA Vaettiheim

Ritual

Summon Commander:#844 Niefel Jarl
Requires enchantment:Illwinter
The caster sacrifices blood to summon a Herald of the Eternal Winter. A Niefel Jarl, a frost giant of an earlier era, is drawn into this world to serve the maker of the Illwinter. This ritual is only castable if the global enchantment Illwinter is active.
